greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Alternating sum of the sixth powers of the first n Fibonacci numbers.
comment: Natural bilateral extension (brackets mark index 0): ..., 14960, -665, 64, 0, 1, 0, [0], -1, 0, -64, 665, -14960, 247184, ... This is (-A119287)-reversed followed by A119287.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-12,117,156,-520,156,117,-12,-1).
formula: Let F(n) be the Fibonacci number A000045(n).
mathematica: a[n_Integer] := If[ n >= 0, Sum[ (-1)^k Fibonacci[k]^6, {k, 1, n} ], Sum[ -(-1)^k Fibonacci[ -k]^6, {k, 1, -n - 1} ] ]
results.author: _Stuart Clary_, May 13 2006
